captions.text: Why does it break my heart
Your frozen eyes
They seem to be crying
I want to go up to you and hug you
You can lean on me
When no one's by your side
I'll wait for you, always
Oh, you're the only one for me
If only my tears, my love could take you in
I'd wrap my soft touches, warm stare around you
Even if you act alright
I can feel how exhausted you are
How long have you been fighting alone
You don't have to say
It's only a painful past
I love you, always
Oh, your secret too
If only my tears, my love could take you in
I'd wrap my soft touches, warm stare around you
If only I could lie down next to you
and share the same dream with you
I love you, I love you, I say inside
I love you, I love you, if only you could hear
You're the only one my only one
Only one in this world
You are the only one my only one
I'll keep you safe forever
One person glowing among all the people
I will always find you
One person fated among everyone else passing by
I will always wait for you
I love you, I love you

comments.author: Jackeline Mantilla

comments.text:
I dont really understand all the hate the drama (and esp this song in 
particular) is gettin! Im not even a sone and honestly wasnt even too 
pleased to see tiffanys name as the singer of this song (sorry bt havent 
heard her sing a lot;;) but i have to say she did amazing, i love this 
song, the lyrics especially go well with the drama n i can feel her emotion 
TT Secondly the drama is amazin!! Who else explains vampirism as a virus 
and bases a whole plot around drug development and includes so much ethical 
debate in a drama?! For me it was even a bit interllectually stimulating 
and even tho the loveline is pretty much not really emphasised till much 
later the drama element kept me on edge the whole time. The actor ahn 
jaehyun (am a fan so am biased) i feel is tryin his best alr. And also ku 
hye sun, ive seen her past dramas n shes so different in this one - voice, 
tone etcetc some people find it unnatural cos its different frm usual but i 
was like this is acting.... Shes definitely tried to put herself out there 
as her character...and i dont really see any major problems w them. The 
best acting tho comes frm the villian ji jinhee.......just wow.. i think 
people should just stick with the drama and give it a go till ep 4 or sth, 
its much more than ur av vampire story n not at all like twilight :)﻿

comments.text:
I feel like the notes Tiffany is hitting are perfectly in her range. It 
doesn't sound strained and it's not outrageously high because even though 
she recovered from her vocal nodules fabulously, she even stated that her 
voice isn't ever going to go back to how it used to be. She's not the 
person to belt out high notes all the time anyway. She made the song suit 
her voice, it's not about if her voice suits the song because I'm sure if 
any one of us did a cover of this song for whatever reason, there is going 
to be COMPARISONS, although some will be stupidly outrageous, to the 
original.﻿
